name: Five Nights at Rowdy's 2
description:
-Description-
Five Nights at Rowdy's 2 is a comedic point and click horror game based on the Five Nights At Freddy's series by Scott Cawthon. You can explore various minigames to get one of multiple endings (2 lol)! This game is much bigger than the previous including, a more engaging and creative gameplay loop, more music (that I stole), more endings, more minigames, and more secrets ;)...
-Story-
After the closing of a local entertainment chain "Rowdy's Robotic Entertainment" an ad runs in the local news paper offering the people who participate a whooping $10,000! However it is extremely cryptic and weeks after applying you receive a letter in the mail telling you to meet at the old factory downtown. As you continue through the experiments you begin to realize not everything is what it seems...
